functions.name: ALERT
functions.description:
ALERT
Display a message as an alert in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the alert.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the alert.

functions.name: OPENURL
functions.description:
OPENURL
Open a URL for a website or mobile app.
examples:
OPENURL('https://www.google.com/search?q=Fulcrum+Mobile+Solutions')

// Opens a web browser to the specified address

OPENURL('comgooglemaps://?q=Pizza&center=37.759748,-122.427135')

// Opens google maps and searches for Pizza near a location

OPENURL('mailto:clark.griswold@gmail.com?subject=turn+those+lights+off!&body=jk,+i+love+them.')

// Opens an email client with a predefined subject and body

functions.name: PROGRESS
functions.description:
PROGRESS
Display a non-dismissible progress message in the mobile app.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: A short title for the progress message.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message content for the progress alert.

examples:
PROGRESS()

// Call with no parameters to dismiss the progress message.

functions.name: REQUEST
functions.description:
REQUEST
Performs an HTTP request and executes the callback on completion.

parameters.name: options
parameters.description: The options to pass for the request

parameters.name: options.method
parameters.description: The HTTP method for the request (POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.)

parameters.name: options.followRedirect
parameters.description: Should the request follow any redirects

parameters.name: options.headers
parameters.description: An object containing keys and values for additional header items

parameters.name: options.qs
parameters.description: An object containing query string parameters (url parameters)

parameters.name: options.json
parameters.description: An object to be passed in the request body, must be `JSON.stringify`able

parameters.name: options.body
parameters.description: The request body to send with a POST or PUT request

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to call when the request is complete - The function is passed `error`, `response`, and `body` parameters
